name: collections::btree::node::NodeRef::<collections::btree::node::marker::Mut<'a>, K, V, Type>::into_leaf_mut

collections::btree::node::NodeRef::<Borr.doc:
Exposes the leaf portion of any leaf or internal node.

 Returns a raw ptr to avoid invalidating other references to this node.

doc: Offers exclusive access to the leaf portion of a leaf or internal node.
